mapper.insert: insert into board(seq, subject, content, reg_date, readcount, mem_seq) values(seq_board.nextval, #{subject}, #{content}, sysdate, 0, #{mem_seq})
mapper.select: select b.seq, b.subject, b.content, b.reg_date, b.readcount, b.mem_seq, b.replycount, m.mem_name name from board b, member m where b.mem_seq=m.mem_seq and b.seq = #{seq}

seq > 0
